title: Or Mirugam Lyrics Paradesi Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Or Mirugam with english translation
Singer: V. V. Prasanna, Pragathi Guruprasad
Song: Or Mirugam
Movie: Paradesi
Music: GV Prakash
Lyrics Vairamuthu

Other Songs Lyrics
1. Thannai Thaane
2. Avatha Paiyan
3. Or Mirugam -- in Tamil
4. Senneer Thaana -- in Tamil

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Yaathey kaala koothey
vazhve pazhudhaachey
Aezhai paadu paarthey
kaadum azhudhaachey

Or mirugam or mirugam
thannai, thanadmai seivadhum illai
Or manidham or adimai endraal
adhu manidhan seiyum velai

Yaathey kaala koothey
vazhve pazhudhaachey

Thaazh pona veedu, kaal pona aadu
onnodu onnaa thunaiyanadhey
Thaai pola nenju, thaalaadha anbu
mazha thanni odu maasillaye

Vali sollave illaye vaai mozhi
kanneeruthaan aezhayin thaai mozhi

Engo thavikkum un pillaye
ingae uravu en pillaye

Kaikonda nellu umiyaagum podhu
kaththaala chorum choraagumey
undaana sondhan udaikindra podhu
illaadha sondham uravaagumey

oru seevano uravile serudhey
iru seevano oththayil vaadudhey
kanneer thudaika aallilaye
kaalam nadakum kaallilaye

Yaathey kaala koothey
vazhve pazhudhaachey
Aezhai paadu paarthey
kaadum azhudhaachey

Or mirugam or mirugam
thannai, thanadmai seivadhum illai
Or manidham or adimai endraal
adhu manidhan seiyum velai
English Translation
I tried my best :)
oh god, its a time’s drama
life became useless
on seeing poor people’s life condition
even forest became useless

an animal, an animal itself
won’t slave an animal
a human, if he is a slave
then it is done by human

oh god, its a time’s drama
life became useless

house without a lock,a sheep which lost a leg
why they become as a pair
Like a mother's heart, deep love
its pure like rain water, not mixed with dust

no words to explain my pain
tear is poor’s only mother toungue

your child is suffering somewhere
here my child is my relation

while one hand paddy becomes husk
even aloe vera is a food
when existing relation breaks
a new relation forms

one soul joins the relationship
two souls diminishing alone
no one to wipe the tears
time will go on..

oh god, its a time’s drama
life became useless
on seeing poor people’s life condition
even forest became useless

an animal, an animal itself
won’t slave an animal
a human, if he is a slave
then it is done by human
